mapper.select: SELECT b.id Id, b.user_id userId, b.tag, b.date, u.name writer, b.title, b.content, b.view_count viewCount, b.post_image postImage FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET tag = #{tag}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, view_count = #{viewCount}, post_image = #{postImage} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT b.id Id, b.user_id userId, b.tag, b.date, u.name writer, b.title, b.content, b.view_count viewCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment c WHERE c.board_id = b.id AND c.is_delete = 0) as commentCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hit h WHERE h.board_id = b.id) as hitCount FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE REPLACE(b.title, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{searchText}, ' ', ''), '%') ORDER BY b.date DESC
